text: Ali Faisal Alfayadh () is an Iraqi politician,http://ahedaliraq.com/?p=1220 Member of the Committee of Oil and Energy Parliament & Member of the Iraqi Council of Representatives.http://ar.parliament.iq/2017/05/03/%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%86%D8%A7%D8%A6%D8%A8%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%B5%D8%A7%D8%AF%D9%82-%D8%B1%D8%B3%D9%88%D9%84-%D9%88%D8%B9%D9%84%D9%8A-%D9%81%D9%8A%D8%B5%D9%84-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%81%D9%8A%D8%A7%D8%B6-%D9%8A%D8%AD/ ==Bio== Alfayadh,(Born in Baghdad 1963)is an Iraqi politician Member of the Committee of Oil and Energy Parliament & Member of the Iraqi Council of Representatives.He is brother Falih Alfayyadh.https://www.alsumaria.tv/news/198256/%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B9%D8%AF%D9%84-%D8%AA%D8%AA%D9%87%D9%85-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%86%D8%A7%D8%A6%D8%A8-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%81%D9%8A%D8%A7%D8%B6-%D8%A8%D9%85%D8%AD%D8%A7%D9%88%D9%84%D8%A9-%D8%A7%D8%A8%D8%AA%D8%B2%D8%A7%D8%B2%D9%87%D8%A7-%D9%85%D9%86-%D8%A3%D8%AC%D9%84-%D8%B9/ar == Positions == * Member of the Iraqi Council of Representatives since 2004. * Member of the Committee of Oil and Energy Parliament since 2014.https://kitabat.com/2014/05/12/%D8%AC%D9%87%D8%A7%D8%B2-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%A7%D9%85%D9%86-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%88%D8%B7%D9%86%D9%8A-%D8%A8%D9%8A%D9%86-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%A7%D9%86%D8%AA%D8%AE%D8%A7%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D9%88%D8%B9%D9%84%D9%8A/ ==References== ==External links== * An Interview with Ali Faisal Alfayadh on Afaq TV * An Interview with Ali Faisal Alfayadh on Al Sharqiya Category:Iraqi politicians Category:Iraqi soldiers Category:Living people Category:1963 births Category:Politicians from Baghdad Category:Iraqi Shia Muslims Category:Members of the Council of Representatives of Iraq
title: Ali Faisal Alfayadh
